titleStmt.title: Love and valour: celebrated in the person of the author, by the name of Adraste. Or, the divers affections of Minerva. One part of the unfained story of the true Lisander and Caliste. Translated out of the French by W.B.
Histoire trage-comique de nostre temps, sous les noms de Lysandre et de Caliste. English
titleStmt.author: Audiguier, Vital d', 1569-1624.
Barwick, Wm.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, for Thomas Slater, and are to be sold at his shop at the Swan in Duck Lane,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Histoire trage-comique de nostre temps, sous les noms de Lysandre et de Caliste.
With an additional title page, engraved: Love and valor. Or the diuers affections of Minerva.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the Swan in Duck Lane
